0.title: Failures
0.query:
timeseries sum(dt.service.request.failure_count), by: { dt.entity.service }, 
filter:dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd dt.service.request.failure_count = "sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)"
| fieldsAdd service.request.failure_count = arraySum(`sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| sort service.request.failure_count desc
| limit 20

2.title: Failures
2.query:
timeseries sum(dt.service.request.failure_count), by: { dt.entity.service }, 
filter:dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd dt.service.request.failure_count = "sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)"
| fieldsAdd service.request.failure_count = arraySum(`sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| sort service.request.failure_count desc
| limit 20

25.title: Successful Requests (HTTP 4xx errors)
25.query:
timeseries sum(dt.service.request.count),
    by:{dt.entity.service},
    filter:{
      failed == false
      and http.response.status_code >= 400
      and http.response.status_code <= 499
 and dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]}
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| fieldsAdd service.request.count = arraySum(`sum(dt.service.request.count)`)
| sort service.request.count desc
| limit 20
